title: Strengthening Teaching Competencies Through Experiential Learning-Based International Practicum Program (PPL) (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories of vocational education and basic knowledge of educational practice
context.additional_context: Development of intercultural educational competencies through field training at overseas vocational schools.

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute an international practicum (PPL) plan based on experiential learning models.
Learners can systematize field experience through reflective journaling to derive educational insights.
Learners can analyze case studies of effective teaching methodologies in global educational settings and submit them in report format.

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (e.g., Zoom, Google Workspace)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
